transcript: But obviously I don't have time for you to stand here and waste my time in this line. There are other people who need service behind you who are waiting for the right thing.

segments.text: But obviously I don't have time for you to stand here and waste my time in this line.
There are other people who need service behind you who are waiting for the right thing.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: But, obviously I don't have time for you to stand here and waste my time in this line.  There are other people who need service behind you who are waiting for the right things.
